name: Dry_Heave
display_help: You strike your opponent with a frigid blast of death, causing them cold and negative energy damage while also reducing their damage output.
display_short_help: Ranged Cone, Moderate DMG (Cold), Minor DoT (Negative Energy), -DMG(Foe; All)

name: Shockwave_Stomp
display_help: You stomp the ground with a single foot, causing a massive shockwave that deals smashing damage while also causing enemies to be knocked back and stunned.

name: Blast_of_Decay
display_help: You strike your opponent with a frigid blast of death, causing them cold and negative energy damage while also reducing their damage output.
display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG(Cold), Minor DoT(Negative Energy), -DMG(Foe; All)

name: Earthen_Prison
display_help: You encase your target in a prison of stone. This slowly crushes them while also reducing their defense, resistance to being knocked around and their ability to fly.

name: Mind_Annihilation
display_help: The longer foes of Mother Mayhem remain within the Seer Network, the stronger her influence becomes over their mind. Eventually, she will take over and rip her foe's minds apart, killing them.

name: Grant_Phasing
display_help: This portal allows you the enter Aurora's mind to aid her.

name: Auroras_Mind
display_help: Aurora Borealis has just enough strength to create these portals that link to her mind. Entering the portals will allow you to help keep her safe.

name: Revoke_Phasing
display_help: The closure of a portal immediately knocks those in Aurora's mind back into the fray with Mother Mayhem.

name: Caught_Between_Minds
display_help: The portal summoned by Aurora's mind is very difficult to affect either positively or negatively due to its unstable existence hovering between minds.

name: Within_the_Mind
display_help: You are within the mind of Aurora Borealis.

name: Crush
display_help: You have been crushed

name: Crush2
display_help: You have been crushed

name: Devour2
display_help: Using this power, you can drain the essence of all nearby foes' souls, thus increasing your own strength. Each affected foe will lose some Hit Points and add to your Damage and chance to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Long

name: Cripple
display_help: The Avatar's ectoplasmic fluid has the ability to drain the energy out of an individual. The affected target is drained of all Endurance and receives a debuff to Recharge Rate and Recovery for 15s. Though this can be devastating, Cripple can be avoided, as it can only affect targets in a narrow cone in front of it.

name: Lightning_Bolt
display_help: You strike your target with a beam of electrical energy. This causes energy damage and endurance drain.

name: Shock
display_help: You shock your opponent with a massive burst of electricty. This causes instant energy damage, as well as energy damage over time, and drains the target's endurance.

name: Short_Circuit
display_help: You unleash a burst of electrical energy around you, shocking all nearby foes. This burst deals energy damage over time, drains endurance and prevents recovery of endurace.

name: Lightning_Field
display_help: You surround yourself with a pulsating field of electrical energy. This causes energy damage and endurance loss to enemies caught within it.

name: Ball_Lightning
display_help: You hurl a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. The explosion causes energy damage over time and endurance loss after the initial energy burst.

name: Fire_Blast
display_help: You unleash a blast of fire at your target, causing fire damage and setting them ablaze.

name: Fire_Ball
display_help: You unleash a ball of fire at your target, causing fire damage and setting them ablaze.

name: Flash_Stomp
display_help: You stomp the ground around your targets, knocking some back while causing fire damage to all those affected and setting them ablaze.
display_short_help: PBAoE, Moderate DMG(Fire), Minor DoT(Fire), Knockback(Foe)

name: Fire_Breath
display_help: Bat'Zul's Fire Breath has set you on Fire.

name: Fire_Smash
display_help: Fire punch attack

name: Fire_Swipe
display_help: Bat'Zul claw attacks

name: Life_Drain
display_help: Caleb taps the powers of the netherworld to steal some of your life and slowing your movement and attack speed.

name: Gloom
display_help: Caleb is slowly draining your life and slowing your movement and attack speed with his Gloom attack.

name: Tenebrous_Tentacles
display_help: You have been enveloped in Tenebrous Tentacles. You are Immobilized and your attack speed is slowed as you are crushed.

name: Dark_Regeneration
display_help: Tap the dark powers of the netherworld to drain a small amount of life from your nearby enemies to heal yourself.

name: Soul_Drain
display_help: Using this power, you can drain the essence of all nearby foes' souls, thus increasing your own strength. Each affected foe will lose some Hit Points and add to your Damage and Accuracy. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Long

name: Blackstar
display_help: You can unleash a devastating blast of Cold and Negative Energy around yourself, dealing massive damage and slowing the movement and attack speed of foes.

name: Guise_of_Mayhem
display_help: Mother Mayhem's control over the Seer Network causes all those linked to her mind to look like her.

name: Pummel
display_help: Devouring Earth brawling attacks

name: Crystal_Shards
display_help: The Crystal Beast can fling Crystal Shards dealing smashing and lethal damage.

name: Prism_Blast
display_help: The Giant Crystal Titan can focus light into an primordial energy blast that can only be resisted by those few who know its secrets.

name: Foot_Stomp
display_help: The Giant Crystal Titan shakes the very Earth itself with a super Foot Stomp, attacking everything in a nearby area.

name: Salt_Crystals
display_help: The Giant Crystal Titan has encrusted you in Salt Crystals. You cannot use any powers, your defense is reduced, and you need help to break free.

name: Lightning_Bolt
display_help: You strike your target with a beam of electrical energy. This causes energy damage and endurance drain.

name: Ball_Lightning
display_help: You hurl a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. The explosion causes energy damage over time and endurance loss after the initial energy burst.

name: Short_Circuit
display_help: You unleash a burst of electrical energy around you, shocking all nearby foes. This burst deals energy damage over time, drains endurance and prevents recovery of endurace.

name: Shock
display_help: You shock your opponent with a massive burst of electricty. This causes instant energy damage, as well as energy damage over time, and drains the target's endurance.

name: Thunderous_Blast
display_help: Deathsurge's Thunderous Blast has temporarily halted your Endurance Recovery.

name: Thunder_Stomp
display_help: Deathsurge has Disoriented you.

name: Thunder_Strike
display_help: Thunder Strike Punch explosion.

name: Pumpkin
display_help: You continue to burn from the Flaming Pumpkin.

name: Pumpkin_Bomb
display_help: You continue to burn from the Flaming Pumpkin Bomb.

name: Fire_Stomp
display_help: Eochai has set you ablaze with his Fire Stomp.

name: Fire_Ball
display_help: The Fireball has set you on Fire.

name: Cinders
display_help: Incapacitates foes around the caster by whirling Cinders around them. The targets are left helpless, choking on the soot. Recharge: Very Long

name: Eye_FX
display_help: An eye of the storm has been created!

name: Nexus_Cleanup
display_help: Cleanup of the merge

name: Grant_Shock
display_help: The eruption of energy from the Eye of the Storm shocks Penelope Yin, dealing damage to her.

name: Shock_Penelope
display_help: The eruption of energy from the Eye of the Storm shocks Penelope Yin, dealing damage to her.

name: Suppress_Untouchable
display_help: Your untouchable state is being suppressed.

name: Suppress_Storm
display_help: The Eye of the Storm protects those within it from the damage caused by the Psionic Typhoon.

name: Sweeping_Blow
display_help: This is a tremendous sweeping blow with your club. It will send most foes flying and crush many enemies. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

name: Overhead_Smash
display_help: This is a massive overhead smash with your club. It will knock the target to the ground. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

name: Skull_Stare
display_help: The stare of the skull has terrified you and reduced your Accuracy.

name: Dry_Heave
display_help: Jack's Skull Heave has weakened you and reduced your damage.

name: Howling_Skull
display_help: A short range, but powerful sonic attack. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow

name: Ground_Smash
display_help: All foes that pass through this Earthquake will be debuffed and may fall down.

name: Venom_Burst
display_help: The poison on the venomous barb is slowly damaging you, slowing your attacks as well as your movement speed. Your defenses are reduced.

name: Venom_Bolt
display_help: The poison is coursing through your system, making it difficult to fly.

name: Disruptor_Blast
display_help: The Disruptor Blast is continuing to damage you.

name: Disruptor_Bolt
display_help: Your Endurance has been drained.

name: Telekinetic_Blast
display_help: The Telekinetic Blast has damaged you.

name: Mental_Blast
display_help: The Mental Blast has slowed your Attack rate.

name: Mind_Scream
display_help: The Mind Scream has reduced your Attack rate.

name: Fault
display_help: Jurassik has Disoriented you.

name: Jurassik_Club
display_help: Jurassik has Disoriented you.

name: Foot_Stomp
display_help: Jurassik shakes the very Earth itself with a super Foot Stomp, attacking everything in a nearby area.

name: Stone_Shards
display_help: Jurassik can throw a bunch of Thorns in a narrow cone arc and impale a group of foes. Impaled foes may be knocked down.

name: Hurl_Boulder
display_help: Jurassik can rip a Boulder out of the ground and Hurl it a moderate distance. The Hurled Boulder deals medium damage and can Knockback foes.

name: Foot_Stomp
display_help: Kronos Titans shake the very Earth itself with a super Foot Stomp, attacking everything in a nearby area.

name: Plasma_Blast
display_help: Titan Plasma burns are hard to heal. The burns have halted your Regeneration rate.

name: Swarm_Missile
display_help: Kronos Titans can launch a pack of 16 Swarm missiles.

name: Incendiary_Swarm_Missiles
display_help: Kronos Titans can launch a pack of 16 Incendiary Swarm missiles.

name: Gas_Swarm_Missiles
display_help: Kronos Titans can launch a pack of 16 Gas Swarm missiles.

name: Quad_Plasma_Blast
display_help: Titan Plasma burns are hard to heal. The burns have halted your Regeneration rate.

name: Gas
display_help: Anyone that passes through this gas will take damage from the fumes.

name: Burn
display_help: All foes that pass through these flames will be burned.

name: Ion_Burst
display_help: Sends a large blast of charged particles at a foe. Deals good damage and also drains some Endurance.

name: Ion_Pulse
display_help: You are taking some energy damage just being near Lanaru!

name: Ice_Shard
display_help: Ice Bolt quickly pelts an enemy with small icy daggers; their chill Slows a foe's attacks and movement for a time. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

name: Ice_Storm
display_help: The Ice Storm is reducing your movement and attack speeds. You are also taking cold damage over time.

name: Freezing_Rain
display_help: The Freezing Rain is chilling you, reducing your Resistance, movement speed and attack speed. You are taking damage over time.

name: Ice_Storm
display_help: All foes that pass through this Storm will be shredded with shards of falling ice.

name: Freezing_Rain
display_help: All foes that pass through this Storm will be Slowed.

name: Particle_Lance
display_help: The War Walker's attacks deal energy damage and reduce their target's damage resistance and regeneration rate for a short time.
display_short_help: Narrow Ranged Cone, Moderate DMG(Energy), Foe -Regen, -Res(All)

name: Particle_Burst
display_help: The War Walker's attacks deal energy damage and reduce their target's damage resistance and regeneration rate for a short time.

name: Sweeping_Laser
display_help: The War Walker's attacks deal energy damage and reduce their target's damage resistance and regeneration rate for a short time.

name: Ground_Slam
display_help: The Warwalker can slam its mighty fists into the ground causing heavy damage as well as knocking down and disorienting its targets.
display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Knockdown, Disorient

name: Smash
display_help: The War Walker's fists pack a wallop. They deal smashing damage, can knockdown and disorient their foes.

name: Pummel
display_help: The War Walker's fists pack a wallop. They deal smashing damage, can knockdown and disorient their foes.

name: Dawn_Strike
display_help: The Dawn Strike has reduced your Defenses.

name: Foot_Stomp
display_help: The Winter Lord shakes the very Earth itself with a super Foot Stomp, attacking everything in a nearby area.

name: Greater_Ice_Sword
display_help: The Winter Lord has slowed your attack and movement speed.

name: Ice_Blast
display_help: The Winter Lord has slowed your attack and movement speed.

name: Freeze_Ray
display_help: You are Held in a block of ice.

name: Blizzard
display_help: The Blizzard is slowing you as it rips you to sheds. Get out!

name: Blizzard
display_help: All foes that pass through this Storm will be Slowed Knocked Down, and pummeled with wind, cold, and shards of falling ice.

name: Snow
display_help: All foes that pass through this Storm will be Slowed and pummeled with wind, cold, and shards of falling ice.

name: Damage_Resistance
display_help: Malaise is resistant to some forms of damage.

name: Spectral_Wounds
display_help: The target is made to believe that they are suffering from real, bleeding wounds, but the effects are initially only in their mind. Only at the end are the wounds made real in a burst of lethal damage. Recharge: Fast

name: Flash
display_help: You unleash a thunderous blast of light that stuns your targets momentarily, holding them in place. After the flash ends, the targets also suffer a reduced chance to hit. Recharge: Long

name: Telekinetic_Blast
display_help: You fire a burst of energy from your mind with such force that it can knock enemies back. Recharge: Moderate

name: Induced_Horror
display_help: You create horrifying visions within the minds of your target and those around them. These foes are held in fear as bleeding wounds manifest on their bodies. When the visions end, the targets suffer reduced regeneration, recovery and recharge rate. Recharge: Slow

name: Lost_in_Dreams
display_help: You induce a dream state in all nearby targets around you while also dealing continuous psionic damage. These dreams can manifest as nightmares, lucid dreams or deep sleep, which manifest as fear, confusion or stun. Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: PBAoE, High DMG (Psionic), Minor DoT (Psionic), Stun/Fear/Confuse(Foe)

name: Mental_Blast
display_help: You fire a blast of mental energy at your target, clouding their mind and dealing psionic damage. The cloudiness results in decreased chance to hit and recharge rate. Recharge: Fast

name: Total_Domination
display_help: You attempt to exert full control over the mind of a single target. The target suffers psionic damage, reduced recovery and may be put to sleep. Recharge: Slow

name: Damage_Resistance
display_help: Malaise is resistant to some forms of damage.

name: Damage_Resistance
display_help: Malaise is resistant to some forms of damage.

name: Mental_Blast
display_help: Mother Mayhem's minion has blasted you with a Mental Blast and has slowed your attack speed.

name: Telekinetic_Blast
display_help: Blasts a targeted foe, tossing him like a rag doll.

name: Resistance
display_help: Mother Mayhem's minion are resistant to Psionics.

name: Damage_Reduction
display_help: Nightmares are really just residual memories pulled from your mind, but imbued with a new level of power by their summoner, Malaise.

name: Lightning_Bolt
display_help: You strike your target with a beam of electrical energy. This causes energy damage and endurance drain.

name: Shock
display_help: You shock your opponent with a massive burst of electricty. This causes instant energy damage, as well as energy damage over time, and drains the target's endurance.

name: Lightning_Field
display_help: You surround yourself with a pulsating field of electrical energy. This causes energy damage and endurance loss to enemies caught within it.

name: Ball_Lightning
display_help: You hurl a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. The explosion causes energy damage over time and endurance loss after the initial energy burst.

name: Mace
display_help: Paladin has Disoriented you with his massive Mace.

name: Portal_to_Malaise
display_help: Desdemona has opened this portal into the Seer Network. It will take you to Malaise's node, where he stands guard over further access to the sections where Mother Mayhem resides.

name: Portal_to_Penelope
display_help: Desdemona has opened this portal into the Seer Network. It will take you to Penelope Yin's node, where you will need to chase Mother Mayhem out of Penelope's mind in order to free her.

name: Portal_to_Mayhem
display_help: Desdemona has opened this portal into the Seer Network. It will take you to Aurora Borealis' prison, where Mother Mayhem has kept Aurora's mind buried for many years.

name: Portal_to_Aurora
display_help: These portals will take you into the submerged part of Aurora Borealis' mind, where Mother Mayhem has kept her hidden away.

name: Portal_to_Shalice
display_help: Desdemona has opened this portal into the Seer Network. It will take you to Shalice Tilman's impression of the Well of the Furies, where she lurks when she is without another mind to control.

name: Psionic_Suffering
display_help: A single target is condemned to suffer severe psychic trauma.

name: Suffer_in_Silence
display_help: A single foe is condemned to suffer psychic pain alone. Should the target remain near allies, they will spread their pain to others, causing major damage.

name: Shared_Suffering
display_help: A single foe is condemned to suffer psychic pain, but they must not do so alone. Allies must collapse around the affected target in order to share the otherwise lethal damage amongst each other.

name: Psionic_Typhoon
display_help: The network node at which Penelope Yin's mind resides is engulfed in a massive storm of psychic energy, due to the continual conflict between her and Shalice Tilman. Any foe caught in this area will suffer continual environmental damage.

name: Resurrection
display_help: You raise an ally from the brink of death. Recharge: Very Fast

name: Resurrection_Simple
display_help: You raise an ally from the brink of death. Recharge: Very Fast

name: Hand_Clap
display_help: Ruladak has Disoriented you with his Hand Clap.

name: Total_Focus
display_help: Ruladak has Disoriented you with his power of Total Focus!

name: Power_Blast
display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back.

name: Explosive_Blast
display_help: Hurls a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.

name: Nova
display_help: You can explode in a tremendous blast of energy, sending nearby foes flying. The Nova deals massive damage to all nearby foes, although the damage does vary. Activating this power leaves you drained of Endurance, and unable to recover any Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long

name: Damage_Resistance
display_help: Mother Mayhem is resistant to some forms of damage.

name: Psionic_Blast
display_help: You fire a psionic burst at the target, causing damage and increasing recharge time.

name: Psionic_Crush
display_help: You imprison your target in a field of collapsing psionic energy. They are held in place and suffer continuous damage and endurance loss.

name: Subdue
display_help: You lash out in an effort to subdue the weaker mind of your foes. This causes psionic damage and has the potential to immobilize your foes.

name: Will_Domination
display_help: You attempt to dominate the will of an enemy, causing them psionic damage and potentially causing them to be put to sleep.

name: Psychic_Wail
display_help: Psionic Storm is a devastating attack that wracks the minds of all nearby foes. Those that survive will have a severely reduced attack rate and may be left stunned.

name: Psionic_Tornado
display_help: You unleash a whirling vortex of psionic energy at your target, causing the target and those near them to be afflicted with moderate damage over time. Additionally, all affected targets are knocked into the air and suffer reduced recharge rate.

name: Psionic_Break
display_help: You slash at your target, mentally injuring them. The target takes psionic damage and experiences reduced regeneration. Their mind makes the pain of the slash real, causing the target to also suffer lethal damage as they start to bleed.

name: Psionic_Pulse
display_help: You unleash a powerful psionic shockwave that ripples through the air around you, dealing Psionic and Smashing damage to any hit by the wave. The shockwave also has a chance to knockback its targets.

name: Judgement
display_help: You hold your target in judgement with your whip, preventing them from moving. While they helplessly tremble under your gaze, you are healed while they suffer damage and are healed less effectively.

name: Aura_of_Psychosis
display_help: Shalice Tilman's disembodied mind projects a powerful aura than can drive enemies insane.

name: Aura_of_Pain
display_help: Shalice Tilman's disembodied mind projects a powerful aura that can cause damage and weaken her enemies to further psionic attacks. This attack also renders enemies affected by it susceptible to the secondary effects of Aura of Psychosis.
display_short_help: High DMG (Psionic), -Res(Foe; Psionic), -Def(Foe; AoE, Psionic), Special

name: Mass_Levitate
display_help: You can send multiple targets violently into the air, then slam them to the ground for smashing damage. This power can bring flying foes to the ground.

name: Grant_Portal_Disintegration
display_help: Mother Mayhem's control over Aurora's mind is nearly absolute. One of the ways this manifests is in her ability to continuously the tenuous links to Aurora's mind. Each portal Aurora opens will be disintegrated by Mother Mayhem quickly if left unattended.

name: Portal_Disintegration
display_help: Mother Mayhem's control over Aurora's mind is nearly absolute. One of the ways this manifests is in her ability to continuously the tenuous links to Aurora's mind. Each portal Aurora opens will be disintegrated by Mother Mayhem quickly if left unattended.

name: Psionic_Lightning
display_help: You cause a bolt of psionic energy to strike your foe, dealing heavy damage. These bolts also have a chance to drain the enemy's endurance.

name: Morale
display_help: You are deep within the recesses of Mother Mayhem's mind! Her terrifying presence drains the morale out of you as you stand and face her - weaken her to regain your confidence!

name: Counter
display_help: A single foe is condemned to suffer psychic pain, but they must not do so alone. Allies must collapse around the affected target in order to share the otherwise lethal damage amongs each other.

name: Shared_Suffering_Burst
display_help: A single foe is condemned to suffer psychic pain, but they must not do so alone. Allies must collapse around the affected target in order to share the otherwise lethal damage amongs each other.

name: Create_Eye
display_help: A void has been collapsed and creates an Eye of the Storm!

name: Allow_Control
display_help: Your status protection is being suppressed.

name: Close_Distance
display_help: Storm Voids will close distance with players that have taunted them. Recharge: Fast

name: Psionic_Lightning
display_help: You strike your target with psionic lightning, causing damage and draining endurance.

name: Allow_Control
display_help: Your status protection is being suppressed.

name: Counter
display_help: A single foe is condemned to suffer psychic pain alone. Should the target remain near allies, they will spread their pain to others, causing major damage.

name: Suffer_In_Silence_Burst
display_help: A single foe is condemned to suffer psychic pain alone. Should the target remain near allies, they will spread their pain to others, causing major damage.

name: Create_Suppressor
display_help: Shalice Tilman's progress to the 'Well' is suppressed by the defeat of a Nightmare.

name: Mind_Suppression
display_help: Shalice Tilman's progress to the 'Well' is suppressed by the defeat of a Nightmare.

name: Aura_of_Psychosis
display_help: Shalice Tilman's disembodied mind projects a powerful aura than can drive enemies insane.

name: Grant_Aura_of_Pain
display_help: You acquire the Aura of Pain!

name: Aura_of_Pain
display_help: Shalice Tilman's disembodied mind projects a powerful aura that can weaken her enemies to further psionic attacks. This attack also renders enemies affected by it susceptible to the secondary effects of Aura of Psychosis.

name: Phase_Resistance
display_help: Shalice Tilman cannot be phased.

name: Resistance
display_help: Shalice Tilman has powerful resistance to all status effects. However, she is susceptible to interference which causes this aura to be temporarily disabled.

name: Untouchable
display_help: You are untouchable.

name: Debilitation
display_help: You have been debilitated.

name: Shalice_Present
display_help: Shalice Tilman's disembodied mind has reached her vision of the Well!

name: World_of_Anguish
display_help: You summon a field of psionic energy around the feet of five targets. This field deals continuous psionic damage over time. Additionally, both the radius of the field and the amount of damage grow over time.

name: World_of_Anguish
display_help: You summon a field of psionic energy around the feet of five targets. This field deals continuous psionic damage over time. Additionally, both the radius of the field and the amount of damage grow over time.

name: Master
display_help: All foes caught in this field of twisting psionic energy will take continuous damage. The field will grow over time.
